casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Shawn Loveto CAMERON, Jr., Defendant-Appellant. SC: 155849
COA: 330876 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 30, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to extend the time for filing his supplemental brief is GRANTED. The supplemental brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before June 1, 2018.
